patthana22.29:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasappaccayo dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā upanissaye tīṇi.
patthana22.29:2.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho sanidassano
patthana22.29:2.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana22.29:3.1_1: dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā upanissaye
patthana22.29:4.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho sappaṭigho
patthana22.29:4.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe
patthana22.29:5.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.29:6.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ narūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho rūpī dhammo
patthana22.29:6.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… aññamaññe
patthana22.29:7.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naarūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.29:8.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana22.29:9.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nalokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.29:10.1: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. Hetuyā ekavīsa.
patthana22.29:11.1_1: paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.29:11.1_2: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.29:12.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nalokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.29:13.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana22.29:13.1_1: kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañcatiṁsa, ārammaṇe
patthana22.29:14.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana22.29:14.1_1: nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañcatiṁsa,
patthana22.29:14.1_2: ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe pannarasa …pe… avigate pañcatiṁsa.
